name: Activation
comment: Must spend a round activating it. Can still defend.

name: Assisted
comment: One ally must spend an action helping you per rank.

name: Backlash
comment: You take 1/4 of the damage you inflict per rank

name: Break
comment: Ability can only be used if health or endurance is 0

name: Buildup
comment: Need to wait 1 round per rank per use of the ability

name: Cancel
comment: Cost is variable, -0 to -20. Ability doesn't work on some class of targets.

name: Concentration
comment: Need 1 round of doing NOTHING per rank per use. No actions or defense rolls.

name: Delayed
comment: Ability does not take effect until before the start of your next turn

name: Elaborate Gestures
comment: Requires whole body to be free

name: Feather Blow
comment: Attack cannon inflict complications

name: Finisher
comment: Can only be used if enemy health = 0

name: Low Penetration
comment: Buffs enemy's armour ability; no effect if enemy is not armoured.

name: No Damage
comment: Does no damage, but may inflict complications.

name: Open to Attack
comment: Can't defend until next turn.

name: Recoil
comment: Gives you Stunned complication.

name: Requirement
comment: Something needs to be true for ability to work; -5 to -20 depending on severity.

name: Self-Only
comment: Can only be used on yourself.

name: Unique Flaw
comment: Not modeled; requires flaw to be added here.

name: Unwieldly
comment: You take -1 to Defense per rank until next round, after you use this ability.

name: Weapon
comment: Attack requires a weapon
